output_list.description: The transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control, allowing arbitrary transfers of tokens.
Integer overflow in transfer function allows arbitrary token transfer, aka 'tradeTrap' issue.
The transfer function allows asset theft due to incorrect comparison, allowing arbitrary transfers of tokens.
The transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect comparison, allowing arbitrary transfers of tokens.
The transferFrom function allows asset theft due to predictable random numbers, allowing arbitrary transfers of tokens.
